description.en_US: Universal SQLite database operations for workflow data management
description.zh_Hans: 通用SQLite数据库操作工具，用于工作流数据管理

description.en_US: Insert a record into the specified SQLite table
description.zh_Hans: 向指定的SQLite表插入一条记录

parameters.name: table

human_description.en_US: Name of the SQLite table to insert data into

parameters.llm_description: The name of the SQLite table where data will be inserted. Available tables: topics, workflow_data, operation_logs

parameters.name: data

human_description.en_US: JSON string containing the data to insert
human_description.zh_Hans: 包含要插入数据的JSON字符串

parameters.llm_description: JSON string with key-value pairs representing the data to insert. Example: {"type": "娱乐八卦", "topic": "标题", "content": "内容", "search_keywords": "关键词"}

description.en_US: Query records from the specified SQLite table

parameters.name: table

human_description.en_US: Name of the SQLite table to query data from

parameters.llm_description: The name of the SQLite table to query data from. Available tables: topics, workflow_data, operation_logs

parameters.name: conditions

human_description.zh_Hans: 查询条件的JSON字符串（可选）

parameters.llm_description: JSON string with query conditions. Use * for wildcards. Example: {"type": "娱乐八卦"} or {} for all records

parameters.name: limit

human_description.en_US: Maximum number of records to return

parameters.llm_description: Maximum number of records to return (default: 10)

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.llm_description: Sort order specification like 'created_at DESC' or 'id ASC'

description.en_US: Get structure and statistics information of a SQLite table
description.zh_Hans: 获取SQLite表的结构和统计信息

parameters.name: table

human_description.en_US: Name of the table to get information about

parameters.llm_description: Name of the SQLite table to get structure and statistics for
